module.name: paypal
module.description: This free official PayPal module can help you grow your sales by adding PayPal and PayPal Pay Later options to your store
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: This free official PayPal module can help you grow your sales by adding PayPal and PayPal Pay Later options to your store. With millions of users in over 200 markets, PayPal is one of the most trusted and familiar brands in the world.
module.additional_description: Activate easilyWith PayPal, you can start accepting payments quickly without any set-up fee. Include Pay Later options at no extra cost to your businessPay Later lets customers pay over time while you get paid upfront. [1] PayPal's pay later options are helping boost merchant conversion rates and cart sizes by 39% [2] Promote Pay Later on your siteLet customers know they have the flexibility to buy now and pay later by adding Pay Later promotional messaging and Pay Later button to your site. Offer fast checkout with less frictionStreamlined checkout helps reduce cart abandonment, drive conversion rates, and encourage repeat business. With PayPal, customers can use their saved billing and shipping info to check out faster — on any device. Get best-in-class fraud detectionPayPal helps you handle the risk of fraudulent transactions with our fraud, chargeback, and Seller Protection [3] capabilities (on eligible transactions). Our AI technology works hard to monitor your transactions – so you can focus on what matters most. Access funds quickly. After a customer completes their PayPal transaction, you’re quickly credited while the payment is processing. Funds settle directly into your PayPal business account. PayPal is one of the world’s most trusted, and familiar brands [4]Millions of global users20+ years of experience200+ markets around the world100+ different currencies  [1] PayPal Pay Later eligibility and availability is subject to merchant status, sector and integration. Consumer eligibility is subject to status and approval. Product features differ by market. See relevant product terms for more details.https://www.paypal.com/uk/webapps/mpp/paypal-payin3/terms[2] PayPal Q2 earnings 2021.[3] Available on eligible purchases. Limits apply. https://www.paypal.com/us/webapps/mpp/ua/useragreement-full[4] Morning Consult - The 15 Most Trusted Brands Globally. March 2021.

module.name: jmarketplace
module.description: Create your own marketplace allowing your customers register as sellers for sell their products in exchange for a commission
module.author: JA Modules
module.description_full: Create your own marketplace allowing your customers register as sellers for sell their products in exchange for a commission.
module.additional_description: We are quality leaders and PrestaShop experts with more than 15 years of experience in the sector and we can guarantee that this product can help you a lot to get the goal you want. We know and like what we do, that's why we offer you the best of us, in a very complete product and at the best price. Our module, your trust marketplace. This module is synonymous with analysis, constant work and innovation. We always listen to your suggestions and requests to improve it and make a more competent, complete product with a good technical support team that is attentive to solve all doubts and problems, always giving the best possible result. Benefits for administrator Expansion catalog with products from other sellers.More sales possibilities.More offer for customers.Compatible with any payment method.All customer purchases are received by the market. When appropriate, vendor commissions can be paid.Very complete management of sellers, products, commissions, etc.Very complete control panel or dashboard where you will be able to see all the market advances.Fixed commission per sale.Variable commission by seller, category or levels (Bronze, Silver and Gold).Super complete configuration per page or functionality. You will not have to modify the code to enable or disable functions on the front.Communication system between client, seller and administrator through the platform.Compatible with most of the available themes. It is ideal to choose a theme that it has been developed with Bootstrap 3 technology or higher. Benefits for the seller Easy and intuitive product management.Export and import products en masse.Management of the seller profile.Commission history.Order history and management.Creates your own carriers and shipping rates.Selection of the preferred payment method to collect your commissions.Graph of commissions received.Request for withdrawal of funds.Centralized marketplace message box.

module.name: magnalister
module.description: Effortlessly sell on Amazon, eBay, and various global marketplaces straight from your shop
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Effortlessly sell on Amazon, eBay, and various global marketplaces straight from your shop. magnalister streamlines uploading products and automates follow-up tasks like order imports, price-inventory matching, and beyond for a smoother operation.
module.additional_description: Easily integrate your PrestaShop with major online marketplaces like Amazon, eBay, and others through magnalister, and take advantage of essential features including product uploads, order imports, price and inventory synchronization, order status reconciliation, invoice creation and distribution, along with numerous automation capabilities. As of April 2024, we support a diverse array of platforms: Amazon, eBay, Cdiscount, Rakuten FR, Etsy, OTTO, METRO, Kaufland.de, Ricardo, hood.de, plus price comparison sites such as Check24 and idealo. We're constantly expanding our network, adding more high-traffic national and international marketplaces, and regularly enhancing the functionality of the magnalister PrestaShop Addon to meet your evolving needs. Discover the full potential of magnalister with a 30-day free trial, and explore the complete suite of features without any cost!

module.name: ndksteppingpack
module.description: Sell products from your catalog, by including them in packs composing "step by step". This module will allow you to create product packs to compose your customers among selections in your catalog
module.author: Community developer
module.description_full: Sell products from your catalog, by including them in packs composing "step by step". This module will allow you to create product packs to compose your customers among selections in your catalog.
module.additional_description: Increase sales of targeted products in your catalog. Increase the value of the basket of your visitors by influencing on sets of products. Guide your customers in the selection of your products. With this module you create as many steps as you want, each with an arbitrary selection of products. For each step you set a minimum rule adding to cart. Once validated rule, your customer can go to the next step. Once all the steps validated, your customer can finalize the order and receive the discount you have set in your pack! New: fix a price for your pack, the system automatically created a product pack and synchronize your stocks.

module.name: smartsupp
module.description: Drive your online sales through conversations, and automate sales with Smartsupp
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Drive your online sales through conversations, and automate sales with Smartsupp. We offer everything you need to grow your online sales: AI, LeadGen chatbots, live chat, and much more you can use to engage your visitors at the right time.
module.additional_description: Jumpstart your sales and boost conversions with Smartsupp. Our packages offer everything you need: AI, LeadGen chatbots, and live chat to help you turn visitors into customers. Automate responses to repetitive questions and provide a personal touch when it matters the most. Gain insights into your customer service with accurate statistics – track customer satisfaction, agents' performance efficiency, and more. If you want to use one of the world's most trusted live chat and chatbot apps, use Smartsupp.  We currently power up over 100,000 webshops and websites so they can better:Chat with customers and build powerful relationships. Our easy-to-install, fast chat box is complemented by Messenger, and email, so every conversation is accessible via our mobile apps.Convert visitors into customers by running powerful lead gen campaigns with automated messages and chatbots.Engage both customers and visitors with our AI-powered sales and care assistants who are always available and ready to help.Understand the conversation flow, how happy your customers are with your team and offering, and what they ask about – but also who converts and who requires your attention. What our users say about us? "Smartsupp helps us to make our online shop even more successful! After a simple installation, we immediately had the first customer with a question, who then ordered straight away."—Oke Harms, Kickerkult.de "With Smartsupp we use one chat in several shops! Thanks to them, we have been able to improve our contact with customers. Communication is instant and convenient for both us and the customers."—Katarzyna, Wujo.pl “70 % of our orders comes through live chat”-Irena ŽIROVNICKÁ, Customer care team leader Unuo Design

badge.label: Customer satisfaction: Partner of the year

module.name: amazonpay
module.description: Amazon Pay offers a trusted, secure, and convenient payment method that allows your customers to use their existing Amazon account to make purchases on your PrestaShop store
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Amazon Pay offers a trusted, secure, and convenient payment method that allows your customers to use their existing Amazon account to make purchases on your PrestaShop store. By integrating Amazon Pay, you can provide your customers with a familiar and streamlined checkout experience that leverages Amazon's technology, learnings, and industry-leading best practises. To get started, merchants first need to register for an Amazon Pay account. Once registered, you can easily integrate the Amazon Pay addon with your PrestaShop online store.
module.additional_description: By offering Amazon Pay, you can:Reduce checkout friction: Shoppers complete purchases in as few as three clicks, with Amazon recognising active logins to avoid re-entering billing, shipping, and payment information. This frictionless checkout experience can help reduce cart abandonment and increase conversion rates by 35%1.Enhance Brand Trust:  The Amazon brand is a proven winner of customer trust. Customers feel confident and secure when they see the Amazon brand at your store's checkout, leading to higher sales3.Benefit from Advanced Fraud Protection:  Amazon's industry-leading fraud detection and security measures help reduce decline handling and fraud risk, giving your customers peace of mind and your business financial protection.Reach International Shoppers: Multi-currency support for Amazon Pay makes it easier for international customers to complete purchases on your PrestaShop store, reducing friction in the checkout process and helping you expand your global reach. [1]: Comscore custom study for Amazon Pay comparing conversion rates between Amazon Pay and native merchant checkouts in the U.S. over a 5-month period from October 2021 – March 2022, n=40. [2]: For two years in a row, The Values Institute ranked Amazon as the top most trusted brand in retail in 2018. Also, in brand rankings from BrandZ by Kantar MillwardBrown and Best Global Brand 2019 by Interbrand, Amazon is rated as the top most valuable brand. [3]:  Consumer Net Promoter Score (NPS) Surveys: Conducted by Amazon Pay in 2019 among US, UK, DE, FR, IT, and ES consumers who had used Amazon Pay in the 12 months preceding to the survey launch dates

module.name: crisp
module.description: Crisp is the all-in-one platform for customer support dedicated to Prestashop merchants
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Crisp is the all-in-one platform for customer support dedicated to Prestashop merchants. The platform comes with a live chat widget, an AI Chatbot and many other features that deeply integrates with your Prestashop online store.
module.additional_description: Transform your customer service into a new acquisition's channel Crisp is a multichannel customer experience platform that helps online store to centralize inbound messages to land into one inbox, allowing merchants to avoid switching back and forth between Facebook, Instagram, Email Inbox or WhatsApp and phone calls. Through a powerful data synchronization between Prestashop and Crisp, merchants can create personnalized and unique support experience. No matter customer's state, retailers will aways stay ahead. The platform offers ready-to-use tools that will make online merchants ready and powerful today, not in a month: Sales and FAQ chatbot templates, empowered by AI and trained on product data are designed to increase revenue and answer repetitive customer's questions. Through a flat-rate pricing, merchants using Crisp for Prestashop can preserve their margins while scaling their customer support process. All-in-all, Crisp for Prestashop doesn't only provide a live chat, an AI Chatbot or a shared inbox: It's full suite of tools dedicated at making online merchants more efficient in their daily customers' relationship tasks. How does Crisp stands out from the crowd?- 55% resolution rate powered by Crisp AI Chatbot- 100% no-code solution to empower teams from any sector- Lightweight chat widget made not to slowdown website loading speed- Free mobile and desktop iOs & Android app- Flat-rate pricing on all our plans- In-house AI models for better privacy-driven companies Simple things you can do to scale your customer support in less than 5 minutes- Decrease bounce rate and CPC with proactive and personnalized chat messages- Improve average number of conversations per agent by creating templated message that leverage dynamic data shared through Prestashop data- Connect channels such as emails, Instagram DMs or Messenger to your Crisp inbox- Build bots to automate repetitive questions on any channels thanks to ready-to-use chatbot templates- Train AI models on custom data such as website data, product data or conversational data. Numbers behind Crisp- 500 000 customers around the world- 50+ languages available- 210 000 000 users each month- 24/5 customer support available in 5 different languages

module.name: trustpilot
module.description: Collect and showcase verified reviews that consumers trust on Trustpilot's review platform
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Collect and showcase verified reviews that consumers trust on Trustpilot's review platform. Automatically invite customers to leave reviews and showcase your store's rating onsite with a drag-and-drop tool.
module.additional_description: Trustpilot is an open-to-all reviews platform where consumers are heard by businesses, and where businesses can earn consumer trust. Grow your business with genuine content that comes directly from the people who matter most—your customers. Trustpilot for PrestaShop Trustpilot’s integration for PrestaShop lets merchants trigger service and product review invitations to customers automatically. Use the TrustBox tool to drag-and-drop reviews and ratings widgets on your site at key conversion points. Read on for what more you can do with a Trustpilot account. Grow a trusted brand Invite your customers to share feedback at the ideal moment. Authentic content generated from your customers helps drive your SEO ranking and increases traffic to your site.Collect reviews on your Trustpilot profile pages, which frequently appear on the first page of search engines.Grow on Google with verified reviews that count toward Google Seller Ratings. Product reviews enhance and qualify your product pages for review snippets in organic search. Increase purchasing conversion and grow revenue Turn real reviews from real customers into real conversion drivers. Showcase reviews across your website when consumers are actively looking to make a purchase decision.Get consumers talking by sharing your reviews anywhere you engage with consumers—paid ads, email, social, and out-of-home. Give potential customers the confidence they need throughout their journey.Showcase reviews in ad creative without design skills with our Image Generator. Increase customer retention and maximize LTV Learn from customers to optimize and improve your service and products. Identify trends in customer sentiment across product inventory, customer service, shipping, price, and more.Respond to reviews and prove you take customer feedback seriously to turn first time buyers into repeat customers and your best advocates.Keep customers coming back with an ever-improving product selection. Product Attributes ratings help you understand your products from your customer’s point-of-view. Get started with a free accountWhether you’re just getting started or you’re already an expert at engaging and building trust with your customers, we can help. A free account gives businesses the tools needed to start collecting, managing, and showcasing reviews. Sign up for a Standard Plan to upgrade your profile page, invite more customer reviews, access the Customer Success team, learn from detailed review analysis, use more TrustBox widgets onsite, produce marketing assets, and get the option to upgrade with Add-on Modules. Read more about our Plans and Add-on Modules: business.trustpilot.com/plans

module.name: psgdpr
module.description: Make your store comply with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR)
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Make your store comply with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).
module.additional_description: What is GDPR?   The GDPR is a new EU legal framework that governs how users' personal data is used. It applies to all automated and manual processing of personal data (i.e., collection, conservation, extraction, use, destruction, etc.).   Personal data is information that is used to identify an individual either directly or indirectly (i.e., first and last name, email address, IP address, telephone number, etc.).   Why choose our GDPR module?   The Official GDPR Compliance module by PrestaShop helps you bring your store into compliance with the GDPR. It meets the main obligations of the EU regulations concerning your customers' personal data, including:  The right to access their personal data and their right to portabilityThe right to rectification and deletion of their dataThe right to retract their permission if it had been requested  It also allows you to keep a log of all your customers' activity concerning their private data (notably data accessibility, permission and deletion). You will be able to demonstrate your respect for the regulation's requirements.

Secure payments PayPal protects every transaction to preserve your customers' payment information and prevent fraud on your site. Thanks to the 3D Secure system, the payments on your store are protected against all types of fraud. PayPal enables you to securely store your customer's payment methods helping reducing exposure to security and compliance risks and providing a quick and easy checkout experience. With their payment information saved, customers can easily make repeat purchases in just a few clicks, helping you to improve checkout conversion. Discover our preferential and transparent rates No setup fees No monthly fee Commission per payment method. Prestashop Checkout offers you very competitive transaction rates. Refer to our price list for more details about your country's conditions. We can offer a custom price for businesses exceeding €50k in monthly revenue. Contact PayPal for more information.

module.name: pmproductvideoreviews
module.description: Publish authentic customer reviews with video reviews and increase your conversion rate! rec.reviews automatically collects video product reviews from your customers
module.author: Business Tech
module.description_full: Publish authentic customer reviews with video reviews and increase your conversion rate! rec.reviews automatically collects video product reviews from your customers. Capitalize on the key reassurance factor: video customer review
module.additional_description: rec.reviews is a fully automated service that lets you easily collect your customers' video reviews and publish them, once validated, on your online store and YouTube channel. VIDEO: A KEY FACTOR IN REASSURING CUSTOMERS The importance of customer reviews has long since been proven. We know that more than 9 out of 10 consumers consult reviews before purchasing, seeking reassurance on the conformity and characteristics of the desired product. Indeed, the best way to be convinced is to ask another buyer. Today, customer experience is much more important than advertising and all those marketing strategies that lack authenticity. Nowadays, however, and particularly with the development of increasingly sophisticated artificial intelligences accessible to all, fake text reviews are becoming more and more common. Internet users are less and less fooled and tend not to trust what they read. On the other hand, videos are booming, especially those in which consumers share their feelings about a product. 84% of customers claim to have made a purchasing decision after watching a video. Whereas behind a text review there is always the doubt of the source and the veracity of the words, seeing a real person talk about his experience makes the testimonial much more authentic and credible, and proves to be formidably effective in convincing web users in their purchasing decision. Moreover, it allows you to view the object from every angle, and to reassure yourself about key product characteristics such as color or size, as if you were in a physical store. Conversions are thus greatly facilitated, and the number of product returns due to non-conformity with the description is also inevitably reduced. MAKE YOUR CUSTOMERS YOUR BEST AMBASSADORS With rec.reviews you enable your visitors to be reassured about the product they want to buy, by viewing, directly on your site, the video reviews of real customers who have the same needs and expectations as they do, and who share their feelings about the product they've ordered. Convincing power guaranteed. This technique, which combines authenticity, customer feedback and mutual support, is known as "User Generated Content": by sharing their experience in a natural and spontaneous way within a short video, your own customers create quality content on your site and help future buyers. They become your best ambassadors, whether on your online store or on social networks, and help create a community around your products. This is an excellent opportunity to increase your conversion rate, generate engagement and build customer loyalty. Still little used, displaying video customer reviews on your store will also help you stand out from the competition. By offering an original shopping experience based on mutual assistance between your customers and the collection of video reviews, you'll arouse the interest of Internet users. Moreover, by letting your customers testify publicly on video, you show that you're not cheating and that you offer quality. Video reviews are therefore a real way of increasing your traffic. IMPROVE YOUR SEO Finally, as video is the medium that captures the most attention, by adding videos to your pages your visitors will spend more time on your site, which will improve your SEO. Indeed, Google favorably ranks pages on which a significant amount of time is spent. Given that a user spends on average 88% more time on a page containing a video, this type of media, therefore, is essential for the SEO of your store. REC.REVIEWS A FULLY AUTOMATED SERVICE The principle is very simple: once a customer has purchased a product, he receives an e-mail automatically inviting him to click on a link to record his opinion in a short video (30 seconds maximum). He can re-watch the video and repeat the recording as many times as he wants. He is also invited to leave a rating between 1 and 5 for the product. The video is then made available to you on a dedicated dashboard and, if you validate it, it is automatically posted on the corresponding product page. But that's not all! You can also easily share the video review on your YouTube channel. rec.reviews takes care of the video editing for you, with your store logo and essential customer authentication information (order date, review recording date, product rating, etc.), and stores the video on a dedicated space. So you don't have to worry about managing your bandwidth, traffic or disk space.

module.name: btecommercecopilot

module.additional_description: The daily task of writing product descriptions can be tedious and time-consuming. And we know that your time is precious. That's why we're providing you with an e-commerce co-pilot that will help you create the best possible, SEO-optimized descriptions in the shortest possible time. Our "E-commerce Copilot" module lets you use the power of GPT-4 artificial intelligence to generate your product and category descriptions, as well as the content of your CMS pages. Don't spend hours manually writing your product descriptions: team up with a qualified partner and save time every day! SAVE TIME EVERY DAY The module installs an e-commerce content writing wizard on your PrestaShop store, saving you time every day: choose the type of content you want to write (short, long or meta description of a product or category, CMS page content), ask the AI to generate it, proofread it, modify it if necessary, then save! In just a few clicks, you'll have a complete, SEO-optimized text with minimum effort. In the same way, you can ask GPT-4 to translate content into any of your store's languages.We've already drawn up prompts for you to send to GPT-4, so that you can start using the module as soon as it's installed, and save time in the process. However, if for any reason you'd like to write your own prompts, you can! A tab in the module configuration is dedicated to customizing prompts.Finally, there's no need to go outside the product creation forms to use AI: we've integrated the tool for generating and translating product descriptions directly within the forms. This allows you to enlist the help of your co-pilot directly during the product creation process! You can also call on your e-commerce assistant at any time, wherever you are in the back office of your PrestaShop store. The AI can be accessed directly via a menu section in your PrestaShop store. KEEP CONTROL OVER THE QUALITY OF YOUR CONTENT Artificial Intelligence is powerful, but it can't completely replace you. That's why we've made it a point of honor to let you control the content generated, ensuring that the text is consistent and perfectly reflects your vision and the style of your store. Once your approval has been obtained, the module automatically saves the new texts or translations.

This added layer of security can protect the merchant from potential scams or malicious activities. Quality Control: Admin approval ensures that only legitimate users gain access to the online store. This can help maintain a higher standard of quality among the customer base, reducing the likelihood of fake or spam accounts. Customized User Group Assignment: The ability to auto-assign user groups allows merchants to segment their customer base effectively. Different user groups can be associated with specific pricing, discounts, or access privileges. This customization can lead to targeted marketing efforts and improved customer experiences. Communication Efficiency: Email notifications for account approval and pending requests keep users informed about the status of their registrations. This proactive communication helps build trust and engagement with customers. Reduced Workload: Automation of user group assignment and email notifications streamlines administrative tasks. This frees up admin resources to focus on other critical aspects of managing the online store, such as product management, customer support, and marketing. Targeted Marketing: User groups enable merchants to tailor marketing campaigns and promotions to specific segments of their customer base. This targeted approach can lead to higher conversion rates and increased sales. Validate Users at Registration Module provides merchants with tools to enhance security, streamline administrative tasks, improve communication, and optimize customer management. These benefits collectively contribute to a more efficient and profitable online store operation.

Tailor the volume of reviews to your exact needs. Whether you need a handful to kickstart a new product's online presence or hundreds to establish credibility for a bestseller, you can specify the number of reviews you want to generate. No Seperate ChatGPT Subscription:At no extra cost, enjoy the full capabilities of our AI Review Generator Module, including ChatGPT integration. module.description_full: Prevent customers from leaving your website by showing an Exit Popup with a special offer or any notification you would like to show and increase the chance to make a sale.
module.additional_description: You spend a lot of time and money to bring customers to your website, with Exit Popup you can keep users on the website for longer and increase the chance that they will become a paid customer. Exit Popup recognizes when a customer is about to close the tab on their browser, when the mouse cursor is moving to the top area of the screen. This may mean that your potential customers didn’t find what they want. That doesn't have to be the case when you have a chance to show a popup message with a special discount or valuable information that might cause them to stay on your website. You don’t need to have any coding skills or help from developers to configure your popup and show it on your website. It takes only a few minutes to create the popup of your dreams. Exit Popup works on desktop devices only because it recognizes the mouse cursor movements which don't exist in mobile devices. If you want Popup for mobile too, check this addon: https://addons.prestashop.com/en/pop-up/91479-popup-smartarget.html

module.name: clicktopay
module.description: Click to Pay is a streamlined, secure online payment solution, designed to simplify guest checkout by reducing friction points like manual card entry
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Click to Pay is a streamlined, secure online payment solution, designed to simplify guest checkout by reducing friction points like manual card entry. It’s directly embedded in your existing card payment flow - delivered by Mastercard and supported by Visa, American Express and Discover. Compatible with major payment gateways: Adyen, Braintree, HiPay, Nexi, Redsys, Stripe, Worldline (Ogone).
module.additional_description: Give customers instant access to their preferred payment cards without the need to always enter payment details at checkout.  * Flexible: Consumers pay with just a few clicks at any participating merchant, with every device or browser, and with every payment card in their profile * No need to manually enter card details or remember passwords for every purchase * No additional costs for merchants and customers * Intelligent user recognition: New users create their unique profile in their banking app* or seamlessly during checkout. Return consumers can be instantly recognized on a trusted device or sign in with a hassle-free one-time passcode. * Compatible with major payment gateways: Adyen, Braintree, HiPay, Nexi, Redsys, Stripe, Worldline (Ogone)   Simplify guest checkout - with Click to PayIndustry standards: Built on global EMV® specifications and in line with PSD2 requirementsTrusted brands: Delivered by Mastercard and supported by all major card networks (Mastercard, Visa, American Express, and DiscoverAdvanced security technology with multiple levels of protection are applied to every checkoutLow effort adoption: One single integration will embed Click to Pay in your existing card payment flow  Click to Pay provides a fast, convenient and secure consumer journey and helps improve guest checkout performance. Your benefits at a glance:enhanced user experiencereduced fraud risk and cart abandonmentincreased sales conversions and customer satisfactionavailable as one single integration across all major card networks (Mastercard, Visa, American Express, Discover)embedded directly into your existing card payment flow

But when you give them the option to easily contact you via Viber right from your website, this feels like a quicker, more familiar way to get in touch. You can get back to them just a few hours later and they will get your reply directly to their mobile device. No more replies getting lost in an inbox with (probably) hundreds of emails! Customize the user experience Choose if you want to have just one person that can be contacted or multiple team members—it’s possible to add every one of your teammates. In addition, you can select different types of designs for the contact button itself, including animations, location on the screen, its general style, and more.

module.name: prettylinks
module.displayName: Pretty URLs: Friendly URL Cleaner | Removes Numbers
module.description: PrestaShop Pretty Friendly URLs Cleaner improves the rankings of your store by creating URLs that are more user-friendly by removing the auto generated IDs or numbers from products, categories, manufa
module.author: FME Modules
module.description_full: PrestaShop Pretty Friendly URLs Cleaner improves the rankings of your store by creating URLs that are more user-friendly by removing the auto generated IDs or numbers from products, categories, manufacturers, and other pages within your store.
module.additional_description: Introducing PrestaShop Pretty Friendly URL Module: Your Ultimate Solution for SEO-Friendly URLs You can now unlock the full potential of your PrestaShop store with our latest PrestaShop Pretty URLs, the definitive module designed to revolutionize your website's URL structure. Get rid of cumbersome auto-generated IDs and numbers cluttering your URLs and stopping you from getting to get top of your search engine rankings. With PrestaShop Pretty URLs Module, you can transform your store's URLs into clean, concise, and SEO-friendly links that enhance both user experience and search engine visibility. By removing auto-generated IDs and numbers from your PrestaShop store's URLs, PrestaShop Pretty URL Cleaner Module significantly improves your website's SEO performance. This results in higher rankings on search engine results pages (SERPs) and increased organic traffic. Clean and readable URLs not only boost your SEO efforts but also enhance the overall user experience. With PrestaShop Pretty URLs Module, your customers can navigate your website effortlessly, leading to higher engagement and conversion rates. PrestaShop Pretty URLs Friendly URL Module seamlessly redirects old URLs to their updated counterparts, ensuring that your visitors land on the right page every time. This ensures that all of your 404 errors are automatically catered for. This also saves you from the potential loss of your rankings due to the change in the url. Our Pretty URLs Module allows you to tailor your URLs to suit your brand and target audience. From product pages to categories, manufacturers and suppliers you have full control over your website's URL structure. Our module is designed with user-friendliness in mind. With simple installation steps and seamless integration into your PrestaShop store, you can start using it right away. In fact you can have your whole store's URLs cleaned in a matter of minutes after installing our module.

Simply search for "PrestaMobApp," download, and explore its features. Supported Payment Methods:PaycometNqoodypayMercadopagoPayPalPaysonMolliePaystackPayPlugYandexPaytabs SaaS-Based Mobile App SolutionPrestaMobApp - Subscription is a SaaS platform that provides a comprehensive solution for creating native mobile applications for PrestaShop stores. Your app will always reflect your latest offerings. Boost User Engagement PrestaMobApp's user-friendly navigation makes shopping a very easy experience.  Customers can browse products, add items to their cart, and checkout quickly and securely, all within the app. Extensive CustomizationRequest limitless customizations to tailor the app to your specific needs (additional charges may apply). Intuitive Admin PanelEasily manage and customize your app’s admin panel for enhanced usability and functionality. Enhanced Security with Finger Login Improve the security and convenience of your mobile app with Finger Login. module.name: gmerchantcenterprobf
module.description: ALL Google Merchant Center from €10.99/month. Allows to export products to Google Shopping + its network, while maintaining control over catalog data imported into Google Merchant Center
module.author: Business Tech
module.description_full: ALL Google Merchant Center from €10.99/month. Allows to export products to Google Shopping + its network, while maintaining control over catalog data imported into Google Merchant Center. Plus: Google Customer Reviews, export product reviews, offers…
module.additional_description: Access all the features of "Google Merchant Center" from just €10.99/month. Pay for the module in instalments and reap the benefits of Google advertising right away, by focusing on optimizing your Google Ads. BOOST YOUR VISIBILITY AND TRAFFIC Showcase your products on all the channels of Google Ads Shopping campaigns and develop your visibility without further delay. Make yourself known internationally in an accelerated way and get thousands of new highly qualified visitors to your shop. With over a decade of success, our Google Merchant Center (Google Shopping) module is by far the most robust and complete Google Shopping module on the market. Far ahead of its competitors, our module is recommended by the largest e-commerce agencies, on the one hand for its simplicity of configuration and on the other hand for the guarantee of exporting to Google Merchant Center a high quality data feed that meets all Google's requirements. The module has been developed to allow you to create, step by step, a product data feed for which you are in control of the information. We have included, throughout the configuration, links to a precise and complete documentation based on Google's official regulations. You quickly get a clear product data file that you can export to Google Merchant Center and which you can schedule to be updated automatically at the desired frequency. Advertise your products for free: with a quality product data feed, you have the ability to display for free your products on Google Shopping, and other compatible Google properties, in "free product listings". Thanks to our module, which meets all Google requirements for quality and completeness of product data, you are sure to meet all eligibility criteria to use this feature, so don't hesitate any longer! Any questions? Our support department has many years of experience and a high level of expertise regarding the rather strict constraints and demands of Google Merchant Center, and will be happy to answer your questions in the best possible way! EVEN MORE DATA CONTROL WITH ADVANCED PLAN Go even further with the "Advanced" plan: In addition to the multiple possibilities of configuring your feed that the Classical plan already offers, you will be able to refine the choice of products or product combinations to be exported thanks to the setting up of extremely precise and personalized exclusion rules. Thanks to the advanced assignation of custom labels, you will also have the ability to segment your product catalog and therefore organize your ads according to the seasonality of your products, their popularity, or the margin you can apply to them. This allows you to control your budget by offering the right products at the right time and optimize your return on investment. In Shopping ads, the display of stars reflecting the rating of items undoubtedly gives more attractiveness to products.The Advanced plan allows you to export your customers' product reviews(*) and to participate in the "Product Ratings" program. The reviews are collected and compiled with reviews of the same products from other sources (including "Google Customer Reviews", review aggregators, ...). If conditions are met, the average product rating can then be displayed in your ads and free product listings in the form of one to five stars. What better to encourage people to click and buy than a discount voucher featured in your ad? Thanks to Advanced plan, you can filter and export the promotional codes to attach to your ads. This plan also enables you to export a local inventory feed of your products, so that you can tell a web user that the product he is searching for on Google is available at the same time in one of your nearby stores. Finally, the Advanced plan integrates the "Google Customer Reviews" feature. This is a free service that lets you collect, via Google, your customers' reviews about their shopping experience. If they agree to participate, they receive an email a few days after receiving their order, asking them to rate their experience between 1 and 5 stars and to leave a comment if they wish. Once a certain number of ratings have been collected, through "Google Customer Reviews" and third-party rating partners, Google can include this seller rating in your text ads and free listings. You can also display it on your store, as part of a "Google Customer Reviews" badge. Through "Google Customer Reviews", Google can also collect your customers' reviews of products ordered from your online store and compile them with those sent through your product review feed, for example (see the "product ratings feed" feature of the module). (*)See conditions in the "Features" section WHAT ARE THE ADVANTAGES OF SUBSCRIPTION? Thanks to subscription, you benefit from all the features of our best-selling "Google Merchant Center" module, at a lower cost. You pay just €10.99 per month, and with the savings you can invest as much as possible in optimizing your ads on Google and its network. You can reap the benefits of this increased visibility very quickly. Would you like to try out the features of the Pro version of Google Merchant Center, but don't yet have the budget? The Advanced plan lets you do so for just €14.99/month, with no commitment. You can switch back to the Classical plan at any time.

module.name: cyup

module.author: DM Concept
module.description_full: CYUP is a complete solution for customizable product configurators, allowing you to easily create and manage options, pricing rules, and sales scenarios, while seamlessly integrating with your PrestaShop store.
module.additional_description: CYUP is much more than just a configuration tool. It offers you clear advantages to improve your sales, optimize your management, and deliver an enhanced customer experience.Here’s why you should choose CYUP for your PrestaShop store: Time-saving: Save valuable time with configurators created and updated in just a few clicks. Automate your processes and focus on what matters most: your customers.Sales optimization: Maximize your margins with flexible pricing rules, personalized calculation formulas, and smart price management based on the options selected by your customers.Advanced customization: Adapt your configurator to your brand's design without touching any code, thanks to easy CSS editing. You can maintain your brand’s visual identity while offering a seamless user experience.Data-driven decisions: Analyze your customers' preferences and behaviors using advanced statistics. Refine your offers and products based on the insights gathered.Continuous support and simplified maintenance: Enjoy seamless integration with PrestaShop, automatic updates, and dedicated technical support, so you no longer need to worry about the technical aspects. In summary, CYUP simplifies the management of your customizable products while improving your business performance, with complete flexibility tailored to your needs.

module.additional_description: No fee per transaction (save on each transaction against classic payments providers )No transactions limitNo private keys/mnemonic phrase needed/stored, only receiving addressesAccept from any crypto user, no only users on such crypto platformAccept the USDT (BEP20), the 3rd most used token, the lowest network transaction fee only 0.3$ per withdrawal/transfer

module.name: facebookproductadbf
module.displayName: Facebook Dynamic Ads + Pixel PRO - by subscription
module.description: ALL Facebook Dynamic Ads + Pixel PRO for €14.99/month
module.author: Business Tech
module.description_full: ALL Facebook Dynamic Ads + Pixel PRO for €14.99/month. Allows you to export products to Facebook and Instagram, while maintaining control over catalog data imported into Meta's Business Manager. Retarget with Facebook Pixel and Conversions API
module.additional_description: Opt for subscription! Access ALL the features of the "Facebook Dynamic Ads + Pixel PRO" module for €14.99/month! Prioritize your investment in optimizing your ads on Facebook and Instagram, and reap the benefits of increased visibility right away. AUTOMATICALLY EXPORT A HIGH-QUALITY PRODUCT FEED TO FACEBOOK AND INSTAGRAM As with the standard version, the product feeds generated and imported by this PRO version will allow you: to automatically populate and keep updated your Facebook and Instagram catalog (Shop)to run product ads on Facebook and Instagram to highly targeted audiencesto show Facebook and Instagram users location-specific data (information translated into their language, prices, availability, shipping costs etc... tailored to their location)to tag your products in your Facebook and Instagram publications or stories Exclusive to the PRO version: Unlike our standard version (available by subscription only), the PRO version of the "Facebook Dynamic Ads + Pixel" module lets you configure your data feed to include only the products and information you want. The advanced exclusion rules system gives you the freedom to create an optimized feed by excluding certain products from your ads. The advanced assignment of custom labels to your products further increases the customization of your data feed and allows you to increase the segmentation possibilities of your catalog. INCREASE YOUR CONVERSIONS AND ATTRACT NEW POTENTIAL CUSTOMERS By installing a tracking tag (called "Facebook pixel") on your site pages, our module enables you to monitor your site's activity and take advantage of the indisputable effectiveness of dynamic retargeting: you can automatically display to your visitors who are also Facebook or Instagram users, the products they have seen, earlier, on your website to encourage them to return to finalize their purchases. You can also display relevant product recommendations based on their visit to your site. Meta will also enable you to acquire new customers by introducing your products to users with profiles similar to your clientele.Exclusive to the PRO version: this PRO version lets you go even further in building your audiences and optimizing your advertising budget, thanks to advanced matching (see "Features" section). You also benefit from greater control over the data sent by the pixel to Meta. OFFER A LOCALIZED VERSION OF YOUR FACEBOOK AND INSTAGRAM ADS AND SHOP Our module lets you use Meta's country feeds to offer multi-country and multi-lingual Facebook and Instagram users a catalog (shop) and ads adapted to their location. For example, a Facebook user in the USA will see your product data in English and prices in dollars in your Facebook Shop, while a French user will see the same information in French and euros. But it doesn't stop at language and currency! All data with different values in other countries will automatically adapt to the locality (availability, sizes, delivery costs, etc.). By default, the module (standard or PRO version) offers you all possible "Country/Language/Currency" combinations based on the native localization packs installed on your PrestaShop store. However, with this PRO version you can create additional feeds corresponding to combinations not offered by the module.

The Amazon module was developed by an online retailer for the service of his colleagues and it was developed by a team of professional developers, by making it easy to use and to have the maximum efficiency. Your purchase is protected by free technical support that is provided unconditionally until the products are placed on Amazon and the first orders are imported. This module was developed by Common-Services, which is a partner agency of Prestashop. module.author: Tiralineas

module.name: adminmobapp
module.displayName: Prestashop Admin App: Manage Presta Store Anywhere
module.description: PrestaShop Admin App allows store admins to manage store’s sales, orders, products, customers, notifications and content from iOS/Android mobiles
module.author: FME Modules
module.description_full: PrestaShop Admin App allows store admins to manage store’s sales, orders, products, customers, notifications and content from iOS/Android mobiles. It features a secure environment and multi-language support, provides more efficient store management.
module.additional_description: PrestaShop Admin App allows e-merchants to manage their PrestaShop store operations seamlessly from any mobile device, whether iOS or Android. By providing a comprehensive dashboard, the admin app for PrestaShop offers immediate access to crucial metrics such as sales figures, order counts, visitor statistics, and conversion rates. This real-time data enables store administrators to make informed decisions and conduct detailed performance analysis, enhancing overall efficiency. App’s real-time order management features ensure that store admins can update order statuses, download invoices, and receive instant notifications on new orders. These features results in faster, more accurate order processing and improved customer satisfaction, as issues are addressed promptly and orders are fulfilled efficiently. In addition, the admin app's robust product management capabilities allow for the easy addition or updating of products. Admin can enter details like EAN (European Article Number) codes, weight, and dimensions, manage product attributes, and upload images directly from mobile device. This streamlines inventory management and keeps product listings current, driving increased sales and customer engagement. The customer management features further simplify operations by enabling you to add, update, or delete customer records and manage addresses. This streamlining of customer service and fulfillment processes leads to a smoother operation and a better overall customer experience. Major benefits offered by Prestashop admin mobile app are listed for a general overview: Real-Time Access to Metrics: Immediate access to sales figures, order counts, visitor statistics, and conversion rates for informed decision-making.Efficient Order Management: Quick updates to order statuses, invoice downloads, and instant notifications ensure faster and more accurate order processing.Streamlined Product Management: Easy addition or updating of products, including details like EAN codes and images, keeps inventory current and enhances product listings.Enhanced Customer Management: Simplified handling of customer records and addresses improves customer service and fulfillment processes. Features Offered by Prestashop Admin AppManage Your Store Anytime, AnywherePrestaShop Admin Mobile App allows admin to manage a PrestaShop store from any mobile device, whether iOS or Android. With its advanced encryption providing a secure connection, the app protects all sensitive data, including customer details and order information. This security prevents unauthorized access and data breaches, resulting in safe and reliable store management. Comprehensive DashboardPrestaShop Admin App features a comprehensive dashboard that centralizes key metrics such as sales figures, order counts, visitor statistics, conversion rates, and profit data. This centralization enables effective performance monitoring and quick access to critical data, leading to more informed decision-making and improved store management. Real-Time Order ManagementWith the Admin App for PrestaShop, admin can update order statuses, download invoices, and receive instant notifications on new orders. This capability results in fast and accurate order processing, minimizing delays and errors while enhancing overall efficiency. Efficient Product ManagementPrestaShop Admin App allows the admin to add new products, update existing ones, and manage product attributes and images directly from the device. By entering details such as EAN codes, product weight, and dimensions, admin streamline inventory management, which leads to more efficient stock handling and up-to-date product listings. Streamlined Customer ManagementBy using the Admin App for PrestaShop to easily add, update, or delete customer records and manage addresses, the mobile app admin can enhance order fulfillment and customer service. This leads to more accurate deliveries and improved customer interactions. Pages ManagementOversee product categories, update CMS content (e.g., About Us, Contact Information), and manage brand and supplier details with the PrestaShop Admin App to keep a store’s catalog and content organized. Secure EnvironmentPrestaShop Admin Mobile App uses advanced encryption methods to protect all sensitive information, which ensures data privacy and security. This protection prevents unauthorized access and data breaches, resulting in a secure management environment for your store. QR Code ConnectionConvenient QR code feature in the Admin App for PrestaShop allows you to quickly synchronize the app with the PrestaShop store, which eliminates the need for manual configuration and enables seamless management. Multi-Language SupportPrestaShop Admin App supports multiple languages, including English, French, Spanish, and German, enabling efficient navigation and management. This multilingual support ensures users from different linguistic backgrounds can effectively operate and manage the store. AvailabilityPrestaShop Admin Mobile App is freely available on the Google Play Store for Android and the App Store for iOS, which allows users to easily download and access the app, leading to widespread adoption and convenient mobile store management.

module.name: smartargetcountdownbar
module.description: Countdown Bar boost sales by creating urgency, highlight announcements, and work seamlessly on both mobile and desktop devices
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Countdown Bar boost sales by creating urgency, highlight announcements, and work seamlessly on both mobile and desktop devices
module.additional_description: Using the Countdown Bar on your website offers significant benefits, especially when it comes to increasing sales and engagement. By creating a sense of urgency, the Countdown Bar can dramatically boost the likelihood of visitors making a purchase. When people see a ticking clock, they feel the pressure to act quickly, which can turn potential customers into actual buyers. The Countdown Bar timer is also perfect for making important announcements, such as upcoming events, product launches, or limited-time offers. The app grabs attention and ensures that visitors don’t miss critical information. The app is designed to work seamlessly across both mobile and desktop devices. This cross-platform functionality ensures that all users, regardless of how they access your site, experience the same urgency and are equally encouraged to take action. By integrating the Countdown Bar Timer, you can enhance user experience, drive conversions, and make your announcements more impactful.

module.name: smartargetrushydeal
module.description: The Urgency Deal app boosts sales with a countdown timer notification popup, creating personalized or global urgency for any promotion
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: The Urgency Deal app boosts sales with a countdown timer notification popup, creating personalized or global urgency for any promotion.
module.additional_description: Creating urgency for customers can increase the likelihood that they will make a purchase on your website. The Urgency Deal app displays a small notification popup that includes your promotional message and a countdown timer, showing how long the customer has to act before the deal expires. You can use Urgency Deal to promote any type of sale at any time. The Urgency Deal app offers individual countdown timers for each customer to create personalized urgency. If you have a global deal, you can set up the Countdown Bar to apply a universal timer for all customers. The Urgency Deal app is also perfect for counting down to special events or the launch of new products on your website. The app is compatible with both desktop and mobile devices.

module.name: smartargetquizpopup
module.description: Quiz Popup boosts sign-ups with gamification, collects data, and offers flexible display options across platforms
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Quiz Popup boosts sign-ups with gamification, collects data, and offers flexible display options across platforms.
module.additional_description: Quiz Popup can help you improve your website by adding a gamification so customers can sign up to your newsletter mailing list and also get a discount code in case you would like to provide one. The Quiz Popup allows you to collect data for better conversions. The Quiz Popup can include photos, simple text, date picked, range by numbers, etc. You can choose which options are mandatory or optional and even to show the quiz for a limited time based on a schedule you select. The Quiz Popup can be shown automatically when customers visit your website or as an integrated floating-button with a call to action that will open the popup. The Quiz Popup is compatible with both desktop and mobile devices.

module.name: ukooparts
module.displayName: EveryParts: Spare parts and accessories management
module.description: Simplify and optimize your spare parts management with EveryParts
module.author: Ukoo
module.description_full: Simplify and optimize your spare parts management with EveryParts. Connect your products to an equipment repository (car, motorcycle, electrical, tools) and offer your customers a fast, accurate search from within PrestaShop.
module.additional_description: EveryParts: simple, efficient searching for spare parts and accessories EveryParts is a complete solution for managing and searching spare parts for your store's products and equipment (vehicles, household appliances, motorcycles, etc.). In just a few clicks, centralize and unify your data from different suppliers, and offer your customers an ultra-fast search for parts compatible with their machines. Offer a powerful and flexible equipment search Your customers will easily find compatible parts for their equipment, enhancing their purchasing experience. EveryParts provides them with a search capable of filtering your entire catalog by this criterion. The ElasticSearch search engine guarantees fast, accurate results, even with a large database. Simplify spare parts integration and optimization With EveryParts, you benefit from powerful middleware that facilitates the exchange and management of data between different IT applications. Whether you sell appliance parts or vehicle equipment, EveryParts centralizes your suppliers' data sources, even if they are heterogeneous (APIs, flat files, etc.). The tool unifies this data and makes it available on your online store, making it easier for your customers to manage and find compatible parts. Exploit the SEO potential of your data and improve your ranking By integrating EveryParts into your PrestaShop store, you benefit from a structure and internal linkage optimized to promote indexing by search engines, even for very large volumes of data. The improved user experience also plays an important role, particularly on the Web Vitals that are taken into account in your positioning.
